statements: SELECT * FROM sales_performance ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_revenue
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales_performance WHERE total_revenue > 1000
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE quantity_sold >= 50 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT AVG(total_revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_performance
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM sales_performance
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, quantity_sold, total_revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE sale_date = '2021-10-15' ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales_performance WHERE total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold), SUM(total_revenue) FROM sales_performance GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(quantity_sold) > 100 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31' ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_performance GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT id, sale_amount, sale_date, salesperson_id FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date, id FROM sales_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT salesperson_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_report WHERE sales_year = 2021 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT salesperson_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY salesperson_id HAVING total_sales > 10000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT report_id, sales_year, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_report WHERE sales_year = 2022 GROUP BY report_id, sales_year ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT salesperson_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY salesperson_id HAVING avg_sale_amount > 5000;

SELECT * FROM sales_data JOIN sales_report ON sales_data.salesperson_id = sales_report.salesperson_id WHERE sales_data.sale_amount > 5000 AND sales_report.sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sales_data.sale_date ASC, sales_report.sales_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SalesPerformance;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesPerformance ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesPerformance WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesPerformance WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM SalesReports ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesPerformance WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesPerformance WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT sales_rep_name, total_sales FROM SalesReports WHERE total_sales BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesTargets WHERE target_amount > 20000 AND target_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_date, sales_rep_name, total_sales FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_rep_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT team_name, manager_id FROM sales_team;
SELECT rep_name, hire_date FROM sales_rep;
SELECT rep_name, commission_rate FROM sales_rep WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT target_amount, year FROM sales_target WHERE rep_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT team_name, manager_id FROM sales_team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT rep_name, hire_date, commission_rate FROM sales_rep WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT target_id, target_amount, year, rep_id FROM sales_target WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY target_amount DESC;
SELECT s.rep_id, sr.rep_name, sp.sales_amount, sp.performance_date FROM sales_performance sp INNER JOIN sales_rep sr ON sp.rep_id = sr.rep_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesPerformance;
SELECT sale_id, total_sales, sale_date FROM SalesPerformance ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price <= 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
